languages.text: {n}Яростные крики восторга сотрясают стены кабака. Глаза собравшихся горят от предвкушения жизни свободной от законов Империума, а многие уже загадывают кому они воткнут нож в спину, чтобы отхватить себе лакомое местечко под солнцем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Яростные крики восторга сотрясают стены кабака. Глаза собравшихся горят от предвкушения жизни свободной от законов Империума, а многие уже загадывают кому они воткнут нож в спину, чтобы отхватить себе лакомое местечко под солнцем.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Furious shouts of elation shake the pub's walls. Everyone's eyes light up with anticipation of a life free from the Imperium's laws, and many are already busy thinking about who they will stab in the back to grab their coveted place in the sun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Яростные крики восторга сотрясают стены кабака. Глаза собравшихся горят от предвкушения жизни свободной от законов Империума, а многие уже загадывают кому они воткнут нож в спину, чтобы отхватить себе лакомое местечко под солнцем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Furious shouts of elation shake the pub's walls. Everyone's eyes light up with anticipation of a life free from the Imperium's laws, and many are already busy thinking who they're going to stab in the back in order to grab their coveted place in the sun.{/n}

{n}Furious shouts of elation shake the pub's walls. Everyone's eyes light up with anticipation of a life free from the Imperium's laws, and many are already busy thinking about who they will stab in the back to grab their coveted place in the sun.{/n}

{n}Furious shouts of elation shake the pub's walls. Everyone's eyes light up with anticipation of a life free from the Imperium's laws, and many are already busy thinking about who they will stab in the back to grab their coveted place in the sun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}狂热的欢呼声让整间酒吧都颤动起来。每个人的眼睛都在放光，期盼着彻底拜托帝国律法束缚的生活。许多人已经在忙着考虑要在背后捅谁一刀，从而夺得阳光之下的一席之地，实现梦寐以求的愿望。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Furious shouts of elation shake the pub's walls. Everyone's eyes light up with anticipation of a life free from the Imperium's laws, and many are already busy thinking about who they will stab in the back to grab their coveted place in the sun.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}狂热的欢呼声让整间酒吧都颤动起来。每个人的眼睛都在放光，期盼着彻底拜托帝国律法束缚的生活。许多人已经在忙着考虑要在背后捅谁一刀，从而夺得阳光之下的一席之地，实现梦寐以求的愿望。{/n}

languages.text: {n}歓喜の声が酒場の壁を揺らした。インペリウムの掟から解き放たれた生活への期待に、誰もが目を輝かせた。多くの者は、日の当たる場所を奪い取る為、誰の背中を刺そうかなどと、考えていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Furious shouts of elation shake the pub's walls. Everyone's eyes light up with anticipation of a life free from the Imperium's laws, and many are already busy thinking about who they will stab in the back to grab their coveted place in the sun.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}歓喜の声が酒場の壁を揺らした。インペリウムの掟から解き放たれた生活への期待に、誰もが目を輝かせた。多くの者は、日の当たる場所を奪い取る為、誰の背中を刺そうかなどと、考えていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los gritos de júbilo sacuden las paredes de la taberna. Los ojos de todos se iluminan ante la esperanza de una vida libre de las leyes de Imperium, y muchos ya están ocupados pensando a quién van a apuñalar por la espalda para hacerse con su codiciado lugar bajo el sol.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Furious shouts of elation shake the pub's walls. Everyone's eyes light up with anticipation of a life free from the Imperium's laws, and many are already busy thinking about who they will stab in the back to grab their coveted place in the sun.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los gritos de júbilo sacuden las paredes de la taberna. Los ojos de todos se iluminan ante la esperanza de una vida libre de las leyes de Imperium, y muchos ya están ocupados pensando a quién van a apuñalar por la espalda para hacerse con su codiciado lugar bajo el sol.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Wilde Freudenschreie hallen von den Wänden der Bar wider. Aller Augen strahlen ob der Aussicht ein Leben frei von den Gesetzen des Imperiums zu führen, und vielen überlegen schon aufgeregt, wem sie jetzt eine Klinge in den Rücken rammen werden, um sich einen der begehrten Plätze an der Sonne zu sichern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Furious shouts of elation shake the pub's walls. Everyone's eyes light up with anticipation of a life free from the Imperium's laws, and many are already busy thinking about who they will stab in the back to grab their coveted place in the sun.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Wilde Freudenschreie hallen von den Wänden der Bar wider. Aller Augen strahlen ob der Aussicht ein Leben frei von den Gesetzen des Imperiums zu führen, und vielen überlegen schon aufgeregt, wem sie jetzt eine Klinge in den Rücken rammen werden, um sich einen der begehrten Plätze an der Sonne zu sichern.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des cris de joie font trembler les murs du bar. Les yeux brillants, tout le monde commence à imaginer cette nouvelle vie affranchie des lois de l'Imperium. Nombre d'entre eux réfléchissent déjà à qui ils vont poignarder dans le dos pour se faire une place au soleil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Furious shouts of elation shake the pub's walls. Everyone's eyes light up with anticipation of a life free from the Imperium's laws, and many are already busy thinking about who they will stab in the back to grab their coveted place in the sun.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des cris de joie font trembler les murs du bar. Les yeux brillants, tout le monde commence à imaginer cette nouvelle vie affranchie des lois de l'Imperium. Nombre d'entre eux réfléchissent déjà à qui ils vont poignarder dans le dos pour se faire une place au soleil.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Barın duvarları coşku dolu, hiddetli haykırışlarla sarsılıyor. İnsanların gözleri İmparatorluk'un kanunlarına bağlı olunmayan bir yaşamın beklentisiyle parıldıyor ve birçok kişi şimdiden güneşe en yakın konuma sahip olmak için kimi sırtından bıçaklayacağını düşünmekle meşgul.{/n}

İnsanların gözleri İmparatorluk'un kanunlarına bağlı olunmayan bir yaşamın beklentisiyle parıldıyor ve birçok kişi şimdiden güneşe en yakın konuma sahip olmak için kimi sırtından bıçaklayacağını düşünmekle meşgul.{/n}
